definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[אנת]] (the root of the pron. 2 pers. in Shemitic: 0’anta, 0anta: anta; f. 0’anti, 0anti: antī; BAram. Kt [[אַנְתָּה]] (m.), Targum [[אַנְתְּ]] & [[אַתְּ]] (both m. & f.); Syr. 0ant, f. 0anty, the n being written but not pronounced; As. atta, f. atti-e Dl:§ 55 a, the nt being merged in the double t; Heb. similarly. Pl. 0’antumo, 0antmu: f. 0’antun=a, 0antn: Aram. [[אַנְתּוּן]], 0atwn, f. [[אַתִּין]], 0anteyn; As. attunu).
